resources.string: This app is made by Tuomo Kinnunen (tuomomees App Lab) 2018. If you have something on your mind please use feedback button. \n\n*If you want to share or use audio as ringtone/notification sound: listen it first, long press and there will be a popup menu. You have to grant permissions for it first.
Maybe you should support next time.
I loved ____ in this app but _____ could be better.\n
I am going to send feedback with.
Can not share audio, please try again.
How you want to use audio
is going to be your ringtone.
is going to be your notification sound.
